verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> down slain <S%H2491><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa. <S%H1533><s%>

And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> followed <S%H1692><s%> hard <S%H1692><s%> on Saul <S%H7586><s%> and on his sons; <S%H1121><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> and Abinadab, <S%H41><s%> and Melchishua, <S%H4444><s%> Saul's <S%H7586><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>

And the battle <S%H4421><s%> went sore <S%H3513><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and the archers <S%H3384><s%> hit <S%H4672><s%> him; and he was sore <S%H3966><s%> wounded <S%H2342><s%> of the archers. <S%H3384><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to his armor bearer, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> Draw <S%H8025><s%> your sword, <S%H2719><s%> and thrust <S%H1856><s%> me through therewith; lest <S%H6435><s%> these <S%H428><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> come <S%H935><s%> and thrust <S%H1856><s%> me through, and abuse <S%H5953><s%> me. But his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not; for he was sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid. <S%H3372><s%> Therefore Saul <S%H7586><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a sword, <S%H2719><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> on it.

And when his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was dead, <S%H4191><s%> he fell <S%H5307><s%> likewise <S%H1571><s%> on his sword, <S%H2719><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> with him.

So Saul <S%H7586><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and his three <S%H7969><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his armor bearer, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his men, <S%H582><s%> that same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

And when the men <S%H582><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were on the other <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> of the valley, <S%H6010><s%> and they that were on the other <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the men <S%H582><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> and that Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were dead, <S%H4191><s%> they forsook <S%H5800><s%> the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and fled; <S%H5127><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in them.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to strip <S%H6584><s%> the slain, <S%H2491><s%> that they found <S%H4672><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa. <S%H1533><s%>

And they cut <S%H3772><s%> off his head, <S%H7218><s%> and stripped <S%H6584><s%> off his armor, <S%H3627><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, to publish <S%H1319><s%> it in the house <S%H1004><s%> of their idols, <S%H6091><s%> and among <S%H854><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And they put <S%H7760><s%> his armor <S%H3627><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ashtaroth: <S%H6252><s%> and they fastened <S%H8628><s%> his body <S%H1472><s%> to the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Bethshan. <S%H1052><s%>
And when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jabeshgilead <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of that which the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to Saul; <S%H7586><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the body <S%H1472><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> and the bodies <S%H1472><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> from the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Bethshan, <S%H1052><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Jabesh, <S%H3003><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> them there. <S%H8033><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> their bones, <S%H6106><s%> and buried <S%H6912><s%> them under <S%H8478><s%> a tree <S%H815><s%> at Jabesh, <S%H3003><s%> and fasted <S%H6684><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
